name: Gentlemans
description:
Up to 4 players supported!

Items:
Pistol - Shoots when used. Has only one bullet. Shoot yourself when eaten.
Bomb - Can be fired, when put close to the candle. It explodes second after firing.
Banana - Can be eaten (gives a point).
Cigar - Can be fired, when put close to the candle. After that it can be smoked (gives a point).
Bottle - Can be thrown into other players to stun them.

>>> CAUTION!!! <<<
>>> Item behaviour varies among levels. Different behaviours can be assigned to different models. E.g. Banana may have behaviour of pistol, or cigar may have behaviour of bomb! <<<

Controls (Gamepad is required):

A - Join

Left Hand:
Left Stick - Hand Movement
Left Trigger - Grab
Left Bumper/Left Stick Press - Use Grabbed Item

Right Hand:
Right Stick - Hand Movement
Right Trigger - Grab
Right Bumper/Right Stick Press - Use Grabbed Item
